title: For optus users
body:
I think they've been informed of the issues, I'm not sure if anyone else has done this but here's a link to their support live chat, I suggest doing it. 

They'll ask you to enter your optus account details into a box on the chat window. So have them handy.
http://www.optus.com.au/shop/notices/service-chat

replies.body: I spoke to them and they said that it wasn't Optus and i should speak to microsoft.
Did they give any reason as to why they said it's microsoft lmao. Maybe you didn't explain it clear enough for them?
That sounds kind of weird, what does microsoft have to do with it?
